description:
Congratulations on the application, all of your projects have very clean and good looking interfaces.

It would be cool if somehow this application could work with Zotero browser addon and would be able to sync with Zotero to have automatically updated citation databases.

Good job!

I love this app and I'm very excited to see it develop into something smart and inclusive. If there could be a way to do something similar to what citation machine does, it would be super helpful. Thank you for the great work.

It doesn't have all the features that Jabref or zotero have it basically just provides a gui for editing and adding bibtex entries. the pdf link functionality is realy convenient as well. I do hope it gets tags, notes and categories at some point

(this was written at version 0.5.2)
